name: Live Your Life Music and Manga

metadata.name: Live Your Life Audio by Evaflow #1 of 50
metadata.description: This Live Your Life Music NFT is proof of authenticity and ownership of the Live Your Life Limited Edition Physical Manga. Only 50 Mangas are in existence. The Manga expands on the story from the Live Your Life Music Video. It is a story of divine intervention through a symbolic black mug. Eva is at a crossroad in his life: in the midst of a spiraling debacle of self-doubt, he desperately wants to make a change and focus on his art. Will he give in to his fears & doubts or will he follow the "signs" and regain his confidence in his ability to express his full potential?
